stories.text:
Hi HN,

I have a passion for solving problems related to peoples or organizations' security and privacy.

I want to see if trying to solve some of the problems I have run into would also benefit others, but before I do that I wanted to see if anyone on HN had also run into similar obstacles.

I am most interested in making it easy for Small and medium size businesses and startups alike to have a scalable and affordable way to manage security controls.

For example, I've noticed basic log collection and simple security controls (outside of authentication) are usually thought about long after all sorts of systems and networks have already been implemented, costing more in the long run.
